name: RowentaX-PlorerSeries75&95
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
No more cleaning, discover an intelligent and autonomous way to clean with Rowenta X-Plorer Series 75&95.

Connect Alexa to your Rowenta X-plorer Series 75&95 products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “Rowenta X-plorer Series 75&95” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “Rowenta X-plorer Series 75&95” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "Rowenta X-Plorer Series 75&95" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill, and you will be navigated to login page
6.Input your “Rowenta X-plorer Series 75&95” App Account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page
7.Now all setup is finished.

Here are some of the phrases you can use to control your products:
START-UP
• “Alexa, turn on the vacuum cleaner. "

STOP
• “Alexa, turn off the vacuum cleaner. "

You can use "Rowenta X-Plorer Series 75&95" with the following products:
• X-Plorer Serie 75
• X-Plorer Serie 95
